ques:
<instructions>
- Please help me check the flight status for flight LH9471 on 2024-7-30. Make sure to select the corresponding date first.
- Please make sure you select the right date date at first, before enter the flight number.
- Please note that flight numbers typically consist of a two to three-letter airline code followed by a 3 to 4-digit flight number. When filling in the flight number for inquiries, be sure to distinguish between these components.
- If a 404 Not Found error appears after opening the page, immediately terminate and return an empty JSON {}.
- For field contents that do not exist or are uncertain on the page, do not make up information; please return empty string.
- When you see the search result page for corresponding flight status, stop browsing and Answer with a JSON
</instructions>

<json_example>
{
  "flightNo": "UO899",                    // Flight number
  "flightDepCode": "KIX",                 // Departure airport code
  "flightArrCode": "HKG",                 // Arrival airport code
  "flightOriginalState": "DEPARTED",      // Original flight state, flightState identified on the page
  "flightState": "Departed",              // Current flight state, mapped from flightOriginalState, avaiable value {Deleted, Arrived, Cancelled, Scheduled, Diverted, Departed, Diversion Cancelled, Returned, Delayed, Diversion Arrived, Return Arrived, Return Cancelled, Possible Delay}
  "flightDate": "2024-07-08 00:00:00",    // Flight date
  "flightDeptimePlan": "2024-07-08 17:05:00",  // Scheduled departure time
  "flightArrtimePlan": "2024-07-08 20:10:00",  // Scheduled arrival time
  "flightDeptime": "2024-07-08 17:44:00",      // Actual or expected departure time
  "flightArrtime": "",                  // Actual or expected arrival time (optional)
  "flightTerminal": "T1",                 // Departure terminal
  "flightHTerminal": "T1",                // Arrival terminal
  "boardingGate": "N7",                   // Boarding gate
  "checkInCounter": "B",                  // Check-in counter
  "checkInEndtime": "",                 // Check-in end time (optional)
  "luggageCarousel": "16"                 // Luggage carousel number (optional)
}
</json_example>
